item.title: About
item.description: I’ve always been fascinated by the finance side of businesses. I started off my pursuits in a bookkeeping role at a local corporation while in highschool and was exposed to all facets of the business. Going into college, I’ve had to priviledge of taking many finance, accounting, and econometrics courses and internship opportunities which have expanded my horizons. I now hope to build my career in accounting or corporate finance where I’ll be able to support the business and operations by providing meticulous reporting and analytical insight.

item.title: Variance & Transactions Dashboard
item.description: Summary: Dashboard that incorporates transaction-level data to assist in month-end variance from budget analysis. Utilized ERP Cloud (SAP HANA) in order to pull the relevant transaction data, the EPM (Hyperion) to pull budget data, and a SQL query to pull relevant invoice information. Then transformed and prepared the data with PowerQuery in PowerBI. Afterwards used DAX and PowerPivot in PowerBI to create a model. Finally used PowerBI to visualize the data and create a dashboard.
